Reviews.Title: Don't Buy This
Reviews.Author: Julie Yocom
Reviews.Content: This phone was terrible. Difficult to navigate the onscreen menus, difficult to find operating instructions ANYWHERE, and the phone kept locking up when I would receive an email. I finally sent it back for a refund which DID go through no problem. Thanks Amazon!

Reviews.Title: Do not buy
Reviews.Author: Spunky Needham
Reviews.Content: Love the bright pink. Works well with AT&T.; I liked it at first but you have to push on the buttons hard to make them work. Also isn't very loud when it rings. DON'T BUY.

Reviews.Title: Terrible touchscreen
Reviews.Author: Lawrence K.
Reviews.Content: The idea is nice, but the execution is terrible. The biggest issue is that if you lock the phone, let the screen turn off, then turn the screen back on, it can take upwards of a minute for the touchscreen to start working so you can slide your finger across the screen to unlock it. 25% of the time, no amount of time would get the touchscreen to start working again--which required a battery pull. This phone is for my daughter, and the uncertainty of her being able to make a phone call immediately was an absolute deal-breaker.The antenna was also not very good, as it barely got 1-2 bars reception when other phones sitting next to it had almost/full bars. The phone speaker produced a very tinny sound.It is being returned.

ProductInfo.Features:
This Unlocked Dual SIM Cell Phone is compatible with GSM carriers like AT&T; and T-Mobile. Not all carrier features may be supported. It will not work with CDMA carriers like Verizon Wireless, Alltel and Sprint.
Unlocked Dual SIM Quad-Band GSM cell phone compatible with 850/900/1800/1900 MHz frequencies for both SIM Slots plus GPRS/EDGE/WAP data capabilities.
2.6-Inch Capacitive Touchscreen, 320 x 240 pixels; 3.2MP Camera, 2048x1536 pixels with video recorder; Analog TV; Push Mail; Social Apps: Facebook and Twitter; FM Radio; MP3/MP4 Player and Organizer.
QWERTY Keyboard; Bluetooth 2.3; Wi-Fi; 3.5mm Audio Jack; Internal Memory: 1 GB ROM, 256 MB RAM; MicroSD Card slot up to 32 GB; Browser: WAP 2.0/xHTML; JAVA and MP3 Ringtones.
Talk time up to 3 hrs 30 min - Stand-by up to 250 hrs
ProductInfo.Name: BLU Q360T-PINK Deco Pro TV Unlocked Quad-Band Dual SIM Phone with 3.2MP Camera/2.6-Inch Touchscreen/Wi-Fi/Bluetooth - US Warranty - Pink
